## QueryTypes.add() method

Add a value to the set of types used to filter.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
add(value: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | <code>string</code> | A type as string. |

<b>Returns:</b>
